description: Parking Intelligence Database - Data Sources and API Resources

data_gov_parking.name: Data.gov Parking Datasets
data_gov_parking.description: Parking facility datasets from various cities via Data.gov CKAN API

authentication.note: API key available at https://api.data.gov/signup/ for higher rate limits

seattle_parking.name: Seattle Public Garages and Parking Lots
seattle_parking.description: Location and characteristics of off-street parking facilities

philadelphia_parking.name: Philadelphia Parking Locator
philadelphia_parking.description: Parking facility lookup for Center City and University City

austin_parking.name: Austin Parking Transactions
austin_parking.description: Parking transaction data from street parking and city-operated lots

usage_notes: Uses Data.gov CKAN API
Filter by organization for city-specific datasets
Resources may be CSV, JSON, GeoJSON, Shapefile, or other formats
Download actual data files via resource URLs
Many cities maintain their own open data portals

census_bureau.name: U.S. Census Bureau
census_bureau.description: Demographics, population, and economic data for metropolitan areas and cities

parameters.for: Geographic level (e.g., 'metropolitan statistical area/micropolitan statistical area:*')

usage_notes: API key recommended for higher rate limits
Use FIPS codes for geographic identifiers
MSA codes available for metropolitan statistical areas
Data available at multiple geographic levels
Time series data available for trend analysis

bts_transtats.name: Bureau of Transportation Statistics TranStats

rate_limits.note: No official limits, but be respectful

usage_notes: Historical data available dating back to December 2006
Data includes passenger volumes, cargo information, operational metrics
Major commercial airports covered
May require web scraping or CSV downloads
Used for airport categorization and infrastructure planning

faa_airport_data.name: FAA Passenger and Cargo Statistics
faa_airport_data.description: FAA Air Carrier Activity database - passenger boarding and cargo data
usage_notes: Calendar Year data available
Reports available in PDF and Excel formats
Data by airport rank order and by state
Supports Airport Improvement Program (AIP) categorization
May require manual download or parsing

fhwa_traffic.name: Federal Highway Administration Traffic Volume Data
fhwa_traffic.description: Traffic volume trends and highway statistics
usage_notes: Monthly Traffic Volume Trends reports available
U.S. Traffic Monitoring Location Data via special tabulations
Annual Highway Statistics reports
Data supports transportation planning and analysis
May require manual download or parsing

city_open_data_portals.name: City Open Data Portals
city_open_data_portals.description: City-specific open data portals with parking and transportation data

authentication.note: Most portals use CKAN API or Socrata API

usage_notes: Each city maintains its own open data portal
APIs vary (CKAN, Socrata, ArcGIS)
Parking data availability varies by city
Real-time data may be available for some cities
Check individual city portals for specific datasets

api_keys_configuration.note: Store API keys as environment variables, never commit to version control

environment_variables.DATA_GOV_API_KEY: Data.gov API key (optional, for higher rate limits)
environment_variables.CENSUS_API_KEY: Census Bureau API key (optional but recommended)

setup_instructions: 1. (Optional) Sign up for Data.gov API key at https://api.data.gov/signup/
2. (Optional) Register for Census API key at https://api.census.gov/data/key_signup.html

data_collection_strategy.update_frequency: Weekly to monthly depending on source

incremental_load.retention: Keep historical data for trend analysis

data_priorities: 1. Data.gov parking datasets - Parking facility locations and characteristics
2. Census Bureau - Demographics and population data for 400+ cities
3. BTS TranStats - Airport passenger volumes and statistics
4. FHWA - Traffic volume data for transportation planning
5. City open data portals - Real-time parking utilization and pricing
6. Stadium/venue data - Event parking demand patterns

coordinate_systems.usage: All geospatial data stored in GEOGRAPHY type using WGS84
coordinate_systems.transformations: CRS transformations handled during data load if needed

best_practices: Respect rate limits - implement exponential backoff retry logic
Cache API responses when possible to reduce API calls
Handle API errors gracefully with retry mechanisms
Store API keys as environment variables, never in code or JSON files
Log all API requests for debugging and monitoring
Implement incremental loads based on date filters
Validate data quality before loading into database
Track data lineage and source metadata for all extracted data
Handle multiple data formats (CSV, JSON, GeoJSON, Shapefile)
Monitor data freshness and update frequency
Target 1 GB of data across all sources for comprehensive parking intelligence
